data: The note "API Endpoint Design Spec" outlines the design of new REST API endpoints for authentication, user data management, and error handling.
The note "API Endpoint Design Spec" specifies the use of OAuth2 bearer tokens for authentication.
The note "API Endpoint Design Spec" documents authentication endpoints including /auth/login and /auth/refresh.
The note "API Endpoint Design Spec" defines user data endpoints including GET /users/{id} and POST /users to create new users.
The note "API Endpoint Design Spec" standardizes error handling by using standard error codes and JSON responses with error messages.
The note "API Endpoint Design Spec" provides a design outline to guide the technical implementation of the company's new REST API.
